Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,retroperitoneal fibrosis
What is (are) holocarboxylase synthetase deficiency ?,"Holocarboxylase synthetase deficiency is an inherited disorder in which the body is unable to use the vitamin biotin effectively. This disorder is classified as a multiple carboxylase deficiency, a group of disorders characterized by impaired activity of certain enzymes that depend on biotin.  The signs and symptoms of holocarboxylase synthetase deficiency typically appear
